thag3.1:1.2: I served the sacred fire in a grove.
thag3.1:1.3: Not knowing the path to purity,
thag3.1:1.4: I mortified my flesh in search of immortality.
thag3.1:2.1: I’ve gained this happiness by means of happiness:
thag3.1:2.2: see the excellence of the teaching!
thag3.1:3.1: In the past I was related to Brahmā,
thag3.1:3.2: but now I really am a brahmin!
thag3.1:3.3: I am master of the three knowledges, <j>I’m a bathed initiate,
thag3.1:3.4: I’m a scholar and a knowledge master.
